content:
isaacvetter edited Issue #253(assigned to isaacvetter)

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 47

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: CDS Services
Section: Passing the Access Token to the CDS Service
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

The scopes granted to the CDS Service via the scope field are defined by the SMART on FHIR specification.

Comment:
Please refer to a versioned document a referene list.

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Agreed, we will link to the SMART on FHIR ballot

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._
